thread.title: Lawmaker: President Trump ‘more entertaining’ than Obama
thread.title_full: Lawmaker: President Trump ‘more entertaining’ than Obama

author: egarland@thehill.com (Molly K. Hooper)
title: Lawmaker: President Trump ‘more entertaining’ than Obama
text:
Lawmaker: President Trump ‘more entertaining’ than Obama By Molly K. Hooper - 09/15/15 05:38 PM EDT 
If Donald Trump wins the presidency, it would be more “fun and entertaining” than having Barack Obama as commander in chief, according to one GOP lawmaker. 
Rep. Mick Mulvaney (R-S.C.) says he’d back Trump if he wins the GOP presidential nomination, and argues Congress would be “interesting” in a Trump presidency. ADVERTISEMENT “I think it would be very interesting to be in Congress with him as President,” Mulvaney said. “It would probably be more fun and entertaining than having President Obama. I think at the end of the day Donald Trump is closer to where I am than Barack Obama is.”
To see the full interview, click on the link.
